## Requirements
R-base

## Preparation
Reading - 10 min
Execute - 20 min

## Ingredients

- N if statements
- N else statements

## Method

```{r factorial_function}
f.fact <- function(x) {
  if (x[1] == 0) {
    return(1)
  } else {
    return(x * f.fact(x - 1))
  }
}
```
